docs.text: Welcome to zhangppss Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Project deploy
docs.title: index

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text: Linux command mount sudo mount -o uid=<uid>,gid=<gid> /dev/sda1 ./sda1 sudo umount /dev/sda1 lsblk | 查看连接到系统的块设备 fdisk 对磁盘进行分区 mkfs # 格式化磁盘为指定格式 sudo mkfs.exfat /dev/sda1 python venv python -m venv myenv source myenv/bin/activate deactivate podman podman images podman ps -a podman run -it -d --name deb --network host -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime localhost/new_debian:latest && podman exec deb /root/start_ssh.sh podman exec -it deb zsh laptop vim /etc/systemd/logind.conf HandleLidSwitch init os # sudo vim /etc/sudoers ps ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL # tools sudo apt install build-essential clangd git cmake make gdb zsh zip unzip curl tree -y woeusb bash woeusb.bash
docs.title: linux command
